com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognizer

Class SpenRecognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognizer.SpenRecognizer

  • public class SpenRecognizer
extends Object
    This class provides the functionality for analyzing and recognizing handwriting strokes as text, shape, and so forth
    This class works only on device equipped with S Pen or tablet device
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SpenRecognizer.RecognizerType
      Recognizer type
      static interface  SpenRecognizer.ResultListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for getting recognition results.
      Register this listener to get results for the request(ResultListener) method.

      • addStroke

        public void addStroke(SpenObjectStroke stroke)
        Add a stroke
        Parameters:
        stroke - a handwriting stroke that you want to recognize.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        InvalidParameterException - Thrown if the stroke is empty
        Since:
        5.0.0

        public void clearStrokes()
        Clear strokes
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • recognize

        public SpenRecognizerResultContainerInterface recognize()
        Recognize input strokes by addStroke(SpenObjectStroke) method.
        This method returns the recognition result synchronously.
        Returns:
        the recognized result if the recognition is successful, otherwise null
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • request

        public void request(SpenRecognizer.ResultListener listener)
        Recognize input strokes by addStroke(SpenObjectStroke) method.
        This method returns the recognition result asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        listener - the recognizer result listener SpenRecognizer.ResultListener
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel the recognition
        It the api returns immediately, but engines might be being released internally.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setDisplayMetrics

        public void setDisplayMetrics(float xdpi,
                              float ydpi)
        Set device display metrics obtained from Resources.getDisplayMetrics()
        Parameters:
        xdpi - physical pixels per inch of the screen in the X dimension
        ydpi - physical pixels per inch of the screen in the Y dimension
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the plug-in object is not loaded
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getDisplayMetrics

        public float[] getDisplayMetrics()
        Get display metric information set to recognizer
        Returns:
        display metric array whose size is 2 containing physical pixels per inch of the screen in the X and Y dimension

      • close

        public void close()
        Close SpenRecognizer with removing memory
        Since:
        5.0.0
